nodes.text: The Kaluthin Are Always Greener is an adventure from the Living Force campaign that was written by Adam Burns and released in 2002. It was the first adventure in the Almas, Sweet Almas trilogy.

The heroes saved Welrin Maduk, a Duros trader, after he was attacked on Cularin by some Dark Jedi. They then traveled with him to Almas, where they discover that someone is trying to kill off the kaluthin and so make Almas unable to sustain life. However, they are able to thwart the plot and confront the Gungan Dark Jedi, Kosa-Yin Hadu.
